sourcesContent:
<template>
  <GMapAutocomplete
    placeholder="Enter an location"
    @place_changed='setPlace'
    style="width: 300px; height: 30%"
  >
  </GMapAutocomplete>
  <button
      @click='addMarker'>Add
  </button>
  <button @click="geolocate">Get Current Location</button>
  <GMapMap
      :center="center"
      :zoom="15"
      map-type-id="terrain"
      style="width: 100%; height: 300px" 
  >
    <GMapMarker
      v-for="marker in markers"
      :key="marker.id"
      :position="marker.position"
    />
  </GMapMap>
</template>
<script>


import { mapMutations, mapState } from 'vuex';
export default {
  name: 'App',
  data() {
    return {
      // center: {lat: 43.65, lng: -79.38},
      currentPlace: null,
      // markers: [],
      // places: [],
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(['storeC', 'storeM', 'storeP']),
    center (){
      return this.storeC
    },
    markers () {
      return this.storeM
    },
    places (){
      return this.storeP
    },
  },  
  methods: {
  ...mapMutations(['addMarkers', 'addPlaces', 'changeCenter']),
  setPlace(place) {
    this.currentPlace = place;
  },
  addMarker() {
      if (this.currentPlace) {
        const marker = {
          lat: this.currentPlace.geometry.location.lat(),
          lng: this.currentPlace.geometry.location.lng(),
        };
        
        this.addMarkers(marker)
        this.addPlaces(this.currentPlace)
        this.changeCenter(marker)
        // this.markers.push({ position: marker });
        // this.places.push(this.currentPlace);
        // this.center = marker;
        this.currentPlace = null;
      }
    },
  geolocate: function() {
    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(position => {  
      const current = {
        lat: position.coords.latitude, lng: position.coords.longitude,
      }
      this.addMarkers(current)
      this.changeCenter(current)
      // this.markers.push({position:current});
      // this.center = current;
    });
  },
},
}
</script>
